header.description: Three scalar display tokens: the reporting period bounds (date_from, date_to) supplied by the user, and the report generation timestamp (generated_at) injected by the server at run time.

rows.description: One row per protocol type from app_protocol_types. Each row exposes the type string as row_type. No filtering, grouping, or aggregation — full table scan ordered by type ascending.

totals.description: No totals section required for this report.

semantics: date_from and date_to are pure display parameters — they label the reporting period in the header and footer but do not filter any rows. generated_at is also a display parameter injected server-side. No row-level filtering is applied.
transformations: No reshape or pivot required — app_protocol_types is read as-is with a single column (type) mapped to row_type.
